display_html:
data DBLayer m s k = (MonadIO stm, MonadFail stm) => DBLayer {
  • initializeWallet :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> Wallet s -> WalletMetadata -> [(Tx, TxMeta)] -> ExceptT ErrWalletAlreadyExists stm ()
  • removeWallet :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • listWallets :: stm [PrimaryKey WalletId]
  • putCheckpoint :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> Wallet s -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • readCheckpoint :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> stm (Maybe (Wallet s))
  • listCheckpoints :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> stm [BlockHeader]
  • putWalletMeta :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> WalletMetadata -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • readWalletMeta :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> stm (Maybe WalletMetadata)
  • putDelegationCertificate :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> PoolId -> SlotId -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • putTxHistory :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> [(Tx, TxMeta)] -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • readTxHistory :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> SortOrder -> Range SlotId -> Maybe TxStatus -> stm [(Tx, TxMeta)]
  • removePendingTx :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> Hash "Tx" -> ExceptT ErrRemovePendingTx stm ()
  • putPrivateKey :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> (k RootK XPrv, Hash "encryption") -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • readPrivateKey :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> stm (Maybe (k RootK XPrv, Hash "encryption"))
  • rollbackTo :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> SlotId -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • prune :: PrimaryKey WalletId -> ExceptT ErrNoSuchWallet stm ()
  • atomically :: forall a. stm a -> m a
}
name: DBLayer DBLayer atomically initializeWallet removeWallet listWallets putCheckpoint readCheckpoint listCheckpoints putWalletMeta readWalletMeta putDelegationCertificate putTxHistory readTxHistory removePendingTx putPrivateKey readPrivateKey rollbackTo prune

}

display_html: type Api t = CoreApi t :<|> (CompatibilityApi t :<|> StakePoolApi t)
name: Api

display_html: type CoreApi t = Addresses t :<|> (Wallets :<|> (Transactions t :<|> Network))
name: CoreApi

display_html: type Transactions n = CreateTransaction n :<|> (ListTransactions n :<|> (PostTransactionFee n :<|> (PostExternalTransaction :<|> DeleteTransaction)))
name: Transactions

display_html: type StakePoolApi t = ListStakePools :<|> (JoinStakePool t :<|> QuitStakePool t)
name: StakePoolApi

display_html: type CompatibilityApi n = DeleteByronWallet :<|> (GetByronWallet :<|> (GetByronWalletMigrationInfo :<|> (ListByronWallets :<|> (ListByronTransactions n :<|> (MigrateByronWallet n :<|> (PostByronWallet :<|> DeleteByronTransaction))))))
name: CompatibilityApi

display_html: data ApiLayer s t (k :: Depth -> * -> *) = ApiLayer (Trace IO Text) (Block, BlockchainParameters, SyncTolerance) (NetworkLayer IO t Block) (TransactionLayer t k) (DBFactory IO s k) (WorkerRegistry WalletId (DBLayer IO s k))
name: ApiLayer ApiLayer

display_html: type HasWorkerRegistry s k ctx = (HasType (WorkerRegistry WalletId (DBLayer IO s k)) ctx, HasWorkerCtx (DBLayer IO s k) ctx)
name: HasWorkerRegistry

display_html: workerRegistry :: forall s k ctx. HasWorkerRegistry s k ctx => Lens' ctx (WorkerRegistry WalletId (DBLayer IO s k))
name: workerRegistry

display_html: type HasDBFactory s k = HasType (DBFactory IO s k)
name: HasDBFactory

display_html: dbFactory :: forall s k ctx. HasDBFactory s k ctx => Lens' ctx (DBFactory IO s k)
name: dbFactory
